column1: Banat is a city in Shamli district in the state of Harit Pradesh
column2: India.Banat is situated very near to Shamli City.

column1: Banat is located at 29.61°N 77.15°E﻿ / 29.61; 77.15. It has an average elevation of 254 metres (797 feet).
As of the 2011 Census of India
column2: Banat had a population of 7458. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Banat has an average literacy rate of 87%
column3: higher than the national average of 74%; with 88% of the males and 85% of females literate. 11% of the population is under 6 years of age.
